class.name: Phaser.Tileset

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: The name of the tileset in the map data.

parameters.name: firstgid
parameters.help: The Tiled firstgid value. In non-Tiled data this should be considered the starting index value of the first tile in this set.

parameters.name: width
parameters.help: Width of each tile in pixels.

parameters.name: height
parameters.help: Height of each tile in pixels.

parameters.name: margin
parameters.help: The amount of margin around the tilesheet.

parameters.name: spacing
parameters.help: The amount of spacing between each tile in the sheet.

class.help: A Tile set is a combination of an image containing the tiles and collision data per tile.\nYou should not normally instantiate this class directly.

public.name: draw
public.help: Draws a tile from this Tileset at the given coordinates on the context.

parameters.name: context
parameters.help: The context to draw the tile onto.

parameters.name: x
parameters.help: The x coordinate to draw to.

parameters.name: y
parameters.help: The y coordinate to draw to.

parameters.name: index
parameters.help: The index of the tile within the set to draw.

public.name: setImage
public.help: Adds a reference from this Tileset to an Image stored in the Phaser.Cache.

parameters.name: image
parameters.help: The image this tileset will use to draw with.

parameters.name: tileMargin
parameters.help: The margin around the tiles in the sheet.

parameters.name: tileSpacing
parameters.help: The spacing between the tiles in the sheet.

public.name: columns
public.inlineHelp: The number of columns in the tile sheet.

public.name: firstgid
public.inlineHelp: The Tiled firstgid value. In non-Tiled data this should be considered the starting index value of the first tile in this set.

public.name: image
public.inlineHelp: The image used for rendering. This is a reference to the image stored in Phaser.Cache.

public.name: properties
public.inlineHelp: Tileset specific properties (typically defined in the Tiled editor).

public.name: rows
public.inlineHelp: The number of rows in the tile sheet.

public.name: tileHeight
public.inlineHelp: The height of a tile in pixels.

public.name: tileMargin
public.inlineHelp: The margin around the tiles in the tileset.

public.name: tileSpacing
public.inlineHelp: The spacing in pixels between each tile in the tileset.

public.name: tileWidth
public.inlineHelp: The width of a tile in pixels.

public.name: total
public.inlineHelp: The total number of tiles in the tilesheet.
